name: Sushis Small World
description:
Sushi' Small World

Made for Ludum Dare 38 by paines.

Description:

Your are a fish, Sushi, swimming in the Ocean, and a Shark attacks you.

Hide in the sea grass! You can wait and starve him to death.

Use Love2d to play the game.

Controls : arrow keys to control sushi

Space : Respawn new Sushi

Escape : Exit

Graphics done by hand sketching and repaointing with Gimp

Sounds done by Online Sequencer
